sense.gloss: to get filled with (e.g. sails filled with wind), to be swollen with
to contain (a contradiction, danger, etc.), to carry (a problem, consequences, etc.), to involve (e.g. risk)
to be swollen and ripe (of a plant ear, head, sprout, etc.)

sdata.j: キューバリブレ|はラム|↑酒↑↓しゅ↓をベースにしたカクテルです。
sdata.e: A Cuba Libre is a cocktail with a rum base.

sdata.j: トム|はラム|↑酒↑↓しゅ↓をがぶ↑飲↑↓の↓みした。
sdata.e: Tom took a swig of rum.
